article:
This is a complete list of recipients of the Israel Prize from the inception of
the Prize in 1953.


For each year, the recipients are, in most instances, listed in the order in
which they appear on the official Israel Prize website.

Note: The table can be sorted chronologically (default), alphabetically or by
      field using the icon.

{| class="wikitable sortable" !Year !! Name http://www.education.gov.il/pras-
israel/list4.htm !! Field !! Comments
|- 1953
|
|Jewish studies |Posthumously awarded prize, three years after his death. First
recipient of the prize for Jewish studies.
|- 1953
|
|literature |One of first two recipients of the prize for literature.
